revised_title: Improving Agricultural Productivity in the 1980s: Contributions of Animal Breeding to Livestock Production Efficiency
tldr: This article discusses the importance of animal breeding in improving the efficiency of livestock production and agricultural productivity. It highlights the need for genetic progress and advances in husbandry to enhance the biological efficiency of animal production. The author emphasizes the role of animal breeding research in adapting animals to their environment, including market preferences, management systems, and popular opinions.
